TopicTitle: Hello and how do I post things? Oh wait I just did never mind.

Articles.Content: I lurked here a long time and I've finally made an account here. Am I the only one who didn't start science mode by having just a capsule sit on the launchpad and have the kerbal do stuff?

Hello Generalstarwars333, and welcome to the forums!

Come in from the cold, lurker.

Happy landings!

I did a launch upwards.

It ended poorly.

Welcome to the forums!
YAY! Thank you! That was quick! *checks time posted* nevermind!
also, how come it ended poorly? you had a parachute, right?

Cool picture! I think that he had a chute, but put it on the first stage.

Welcome Aboard!
